SVGraphics

Class SVCustom

  • java.lang.Object
    • SVGraphics.SVGraphics
      • SVGraphics.SVCustom
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Peg, SierpinskiTriangle, Tower, TriangleSide

    public class SVCustom
extends SVGraphics
    SVCustom class extends SVGraphics allowing customized SVG content using g tag

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SVCustom()
      no-arg constructor calls super and sets tag to g
      SVCustom(java.awt.Point location)
      no-arg constructor calls super, sets tag to g, and sets location
